Half-Life is alright... it is product of it's time. The graphics are aged, dialog and storytelling is bad and the VO is not great.
Graphic wise, this game was made a long time ago, so old graphics are to be expected. However some of the textures and lighting just don't quite work, and often ruin the sense of immersion.
Dialog and Storytelling are the main issues with this game. You have to stand right up to the people talking to even hear them, and often you wont even know they are telling you something, meaning you have no clue what to do in the story or why you are doing certain tasks (such as going to lambda station).
This issue leads into the VO. Clearly, Valve was only just getting the hang of things and their studio hadn't been able to get in "New" recording tech. And that is noticeable in this game.
Often I found myself bored and wondering "When will this game end???", and whenever i think that, something is wrong.
So, for these reasons, I don't believe I would ever play Half-Life again. However, if you have played other Half-Life games and want to see where it started like i did, I would recommend it, as at least you have that sense of curiosity to keep you going.
Half-Life gets a 4/10.

For more reviews check my Steam profile

Первая часть легендарной серии "half life" это больше, чем обычная игра. Как и "CS 1.6" с этой игрой я познакомился ещё с раннего возраста и с удовольствием проводил сотни часов на пролет. За последнии 20 лет вышло уйма хороших игр с своими уникальными механиками и геймплеем, но, переплюнуть в "CS 1.6" и "Half life" не смогла ни одна. Радует то, что обе эти игры до сих пор полны игроков и даже ночью можно найти сервер и зарубится как в старые добрые.

Pros:
-I got to be a soldier, a scientist, a space warrior, a crowbar-weilding maniac, and a Ghostbuster at the same time.
-Shot nearly everything in the game, including the people trying to help me.

Cons:
-In a facility practically overflowing with deadly weaponry, only one scientist thought to actually arm himself.
-I've become deathly paranoid about laboratories. Any time I'm in one, I start checking under the tables for headcrabs.

Highly recommended.

Всё хорошо. Весёлый и интересный шутер, способен порой напугать неожиданными появлениями врагов или проломами в полу.   
Единственное, что не понравилось, учёные и охранники порой не шли открывать дверь (возможно, эта проблема связано с русификатором) и их приходилось толкать самому до неё. Один же раз пришлось прибегнуть к использованию noclip.

This game has really boring game play, The story is good and i like the story quite a lot. But i don't get a game for the story solely i get it because it's fun and enjoyable, and this game just doesn't meet those standards due to it having really basic combat along with very bad graphics. This is a game you only get for story, if you are looking for a game with good combat and that is fun to play. This just isn't it.
